mapper.select: select * from tb_notice_board where nb_status = 'N' order by nb_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_notice_board (m_idx, nb_writer, nb_title, nb_content) values (#{m_idx}, #{nb_writer}, #{nb_title}, #{nb_content})
insert into tb_notice_attached (origin_filename, save_filename, nb_idx) values (#{origin_filename}, #{save_filename}, #{nb_idx})
mapper.update: update tb_notice_board set read_cnt = read_cnt+1 where nb_idx=#{nb_idx}
update tb_notice_board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content}, update_date = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}
update tb_notice_board set b_status='Y', update_date = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}
